product.title: Dumbo and His New Act | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Dumbo and His New Act

The classic tale of Dumbo, the flying circus elephant, has enchanted young readers for decades. In this long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed Disney animated movie, Dumbo grows tired of his flying elephant performance and longs to discover a new showstopper. On his quest for a new act, Dumbo quickly learns that he doesn’t have the knack for the trapeze, and that he’s not suited for bicycle riding like circus bears, or for prancing like a circus pony. While searching for his new act, Dumbo discovers a hidden talent that is sure to wow the big top. Young readers will learn the value of exploring new activities and mastering new skills.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to identify the circus acts she would like to perform, and talk about why she chose each of these acts. Encourage her to elaborate on how she would prepare for them.
